snippet.title: River City Girls 2 - New Playable Characters DLC Reveal!!
snippet.description: New River City Girls 2 DLC is on the way! The Double Dragons, Billy and Jimmy Lee - played by Arin Hansen & Dan Avidan of the Game Grumps - are busting out of their dojos and joining the game as premium playable character DLC this summer! New shops and other free content is on the way as well! Get more info here: https://wayforward.com/news/double-dragon-dlc-announced-for-river-city-girls-2
